description: 学习被动语态在不同时态中的变化

basic_rules: 被动语态在不同时态中的be动词变化
将来时：will be + 过去分词
现在完成时：have/has been + 过去分词
tense_forms: 现在时：The book is written by Mark Twain.
过去时：The book was written by Mark Twain.
将来时：The book will be written by Mark Twain.
现在完成时：The book has been written by Mark Twain.
common_errors: The book will be wrote by Mark Twain. (错误) → The book will be written by Mark Twain. (正确)
The book has been wrote by Mark Twain. (错误) → The book has been written by Mark Twain. (正确)
The book is wrote by Mark Twain. (错误) → The book is written by Mark Twain. (正确)
usage_tips: 被动语态的时态变化体现在be动词上
注意不同时态的be动词选择

present_simple: The book is written by Mark Twain.
English is spoken all over the world.
The car is made in Japan.
The letter is sent by post.
The house is built every year.
past_simple: The book was written by Mark Twain.
English was spoken here last year.
The car was made in Japan.
The letter was sent by post.
The house was built last year.
future_simple: The book will be written by Mark Twain.
The car will be made in Japan.
The letter will be sent by post.
The house will be built next year.
present_perfect: The book has been written by Mark Twain.
English has been spoken here for years.
The car has been made in Japan.
The letter has been sent by post.
The house has been built recently.

templates.question: The book _____ written by Mark Twain.
The book _____ be written by Mark Twain.
templates.explanation: 将来时被动语态用will be

templates.question: The book _____ written by Mark Twain.
The book _____ been written by Mark Twain.
templates.explanation: 现在完成时被动语态用has been

templates.question: 将主动语态变为被动语态：Mark Twain wrote the book.
templates.answer: The book was written by Mark Twain.
templates.explanation: 过去时被动语态用was + 过去分词

templates.question: 将主动语态变为被动语态：Mark Twain will write the book.
templates.answer: The book will be written by Mark Twain.
templates.explanation: 将来时被动语态用will be + 过去分词

learning_objectives: 掌握被动语态在不同时态中的变化
能够正确使用各种时态的被动语态
了解被动语态的时态变化规律

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用各种时态的被动语态，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握各种时态的被动语态，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解各种时态的被动语态，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对各种时态的被动语态不熟悉，需要重新学习
